metadata.name: Customer Segmentation Analysis
metadata.description: Segment customers by behavior, value, and characteristics

task.instructions: # Customer Segmentation Analysis Segment customers to personalize marketing and maximize LTV. ## Segmentation Approaches - RFM (Recency, Frequency, Monetary) - Behavioral (engagement, usage patterns) - Demographic/firmographic - Psychographic (values, motivations) - Lifecycle stage (new, active, at-risk, churned) ## Process 1. Define segmentation criteria 2. Analyze customer data 3. Create segments with distinct profiles 4. Size and value each segment 5. Develop segment-specific strategies
